remarks: Version of ~ dvelimv without any variable restrictions.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2002.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-May-2018.)
statement:
dvelimf.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
dvelimf.2 $e |- F/ z ps $.
dvelimf.3 $e |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dvelimf $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> F/ x ps ) $.
